name: late winter nights.
description:
You arrive late at home, and there is a storm coming tonight.

You should prepare yourself and make your home cozy so you can relax, in your safe space.

This game was made by Sara Martins and Vasco Rodrigues for Global Game Jam 19.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Rain falling sound by kwazi.
Frogs and crickets sound by greysound.
Fireplace sound by stratcat322.
Cat Meow by tuberatanka.
Cat Purr and Meow by skymary.
Cat food falling in bowl sound by 170048@virtualwindow.co.za.
Music on the turntable (likesumoneinluv.wav) by Lofi Leon.
